data.title: Browse Title Index
meta_keywords: Public Health; Health Intelligence; Health care; Quality of Healthcare; Disease Prevention; Non-communicable and Communicable Disease epidemiology; Genetics and Genetic Epidemiology; Community Health Improvement; Prevention; open access
data.meta_description: The Journal of Public Health in Developing Countries (JPHDC) is a non-profit, peer-reviewed, open access, international, scientific journal that publishes articles in all areas of public health.
